name: CAIRO
description: Cairo is an all about in one solution idea with its own deflationary system which offers all DEFI products on one platform. Optimizing returns with the Cairo protocol The yield farming service provided by Cairo is enabled by the use of ‘Pools’, in which individuals stake their crypto tokens. Through automation, Cairo enables individuals to participate in pools, farm yields, and enjoy the benefits of compound interest without having to go through several complex steps. Cairo calculates the most optimal compounding frequency and automatically reinvests tokens via smart contracts.
